attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I wish the government to make it manditory for manufactures of things like toilet rolls biscuits and sweet bars such as Mars bars to declare the size as the standard by which we can all say this is a Mars bar this is a toilet roll ETC.
Far to often we see these items and the like put on the market and then as we have come to know and love them the makers change the boundries and alter the size as suits them. This is not on if a Mars bar has a standard then that is a Mars bar, okay if the price has to go up fine, so long as the standard remains the norm and remains unaltered.
Maybe many like myself are fed up wiping your backside on an ever decreasing till roll.
Please help the campaign to address these unequal standards.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
